trans-unit.source: This exception is typically thrown on the client when a channel is terminated due to server closing the associated connection.

This exception derives from <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException> that represents a class of recoverable errors that may be thrown during communication between endpoints and which robust [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] client and service applications are expected to handle.
trans-unit.target: 此例外狀況衍生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException>，代表在端點間進行通訊時可能會擲回之可修復的錯誤類別，穩定的 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 用戶端與服務應用程式應能處理此狀況。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the more generic <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException> handler from catching the more specific <xref:System.ServiceModel.ActionNotSupportedException>, catch this exception prior to handling <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException>.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免由比較泛型的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException> 處理常式來攔截比較特定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ActionNotSupportedException>，請在處理 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException> 之前攔截此例外狀況 (Exception)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException" /> class.
If you want to pass an error message to the user, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要將錯誤訊息傳遞給使用者，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException.%23ctor%28System.String%29> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: If you want to pass an error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of the exception to the user, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Exception%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要將錯誤訊息與造成例外狀況的內部例外狀況參考傳遞給使用者，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Exception%29> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: If you want to pass serialization information and streaming context, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳遞序列化資訊和資料流內容，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException" /> class.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException" /> class with a specified error message.
Use this constructor when you want to pass an error message to the user.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要傳遞錯誤訊息給使用者時，可以使用此建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The content of the message parameter should be understandable to the intended users.
trans-unit.target: 訊息參數的內容應該要能夠讓目標使用者了解。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that contains all the data required to serialize the exception.
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that specifies the source and destination of the stream.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException" /> class with serialization information and streaming context specified.
This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstruct the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式，以重建在資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the current exception to be thrown.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ChannelTerminatedException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of the exception.
Use this constructor when you want to pass an error message and information about an inner exception up to the user.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要傳遞錯誤訊息和有關內部例外狀況的資訊給使用者時，請使用此建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The content of the message parameter should be understandable to the intended users.
trans-unit.target: 訊息參數的內容應該要能夠讓目標使用者了解。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 直接因為前一個例外狀況而擲回的例外狀況可能包含對 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳遞到建構函式中相同的值，如果 `null` 屬性沒有將內部例外狀況值提供給建構函式，則會傳回 `Nothing` 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>)。
